3601.bart_summary: Jesse O'Brien has to take a daily dose of 45 pills to treat cystic fibrosis. His mother Heidi, 37, took the video to encourage him to take his pills. The video finally hit the one million mark exactly a week after Heidi posted it, first thing on Wednesday morning.
